original_text: The angel replied, ‘Even if I stay with you, I will not eat your food. But you may prepare a burnt offering as a sacrifice to the Lord.’ The angel said that because Manoah had not realized that he was the Lord's angel.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 마노아에게 이르되 네가 비록 나를 머물게 하나 내가 네 음식을 먹지 아니하리라 번제를 준비하려거든 마땅히 여호와께 드릴지니라 하니 이는 그가 여호와의 사자인 줄을 마노아가 알지 못함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Even if I stay with you
I will not eat your food
But you may prepare a burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 번제를 준비할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: as a sacrifice to the Lord
that he was the Lord's angel
